mapper.select:
/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.impl.SerialScanningGISTOMapper.serialScanningGISTODataList] - KR JUN */ SELECT Z.DELNO , Z.REQSTNO , Z.REQSTDT , Z.REQSTTYPE , Z.TRNSCTYPE , Z.TRNSCTYPEDTL , Z.TOLOC , Z.FRMLOCID , Z.TOLOCID , Z.DELDATE , SUM(Z.DELQTY) AS DELQTY FROM ( SELECT l55.DELVRY_NO AS DELNO , l47.REQST_NO AS REQSTNO , TO_CHAR(l47.REQST_CRT_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS REQSTDT , l47.REQST_TYPE AS REQSTTYPE , l47.TRNSC_TYPE AS TRNSCTYPE -- US : STO, UM and L47.REQST_TYPE = 'PO' : Inbound SMO, UM and L47.REQST_TYPE <> 'PO' : SMO , l47.TRNSC_TYPE_DTL AS TRNSCTYPEDTL , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (s28q.WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) AS TOLOC , l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC AS FRMLOCID , l47.REQST_CDC_RDC AS TOLOCID , NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(l54.DELVRY_DT, 'yyyymmdd'), 'dd/mm/yyyy'), '-') AS DELDATE , NVL(l55.DELVRY_QTY,0) AS DELQTY FROM LOG0047M l47 , LOG0048D l48 , LOG0055D l55 , LOG0054M l54 , SYS0028M s28q WHERE l47.REQST_NO = l48.REQST_NO AND l47.REQST_NO = l55.REQST_NO(+) AND l55.DELVRY_NO = l54.DELVRY_NO(+) AND l47.REQST_CDC_RDC = s28q.WH_LOC_ID(+) AND l47.REQST_CRT_DT >= to_date(#{searchReqSDate},'dd/mm/yyyy') -- FROM AND l47.REQST_CRT_DT <= to_date(#{searchReqEDate} || ' 23:59:59','dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') -- TO AND (1, l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC) IN
(1, #{item})
AND l47.trnsc_type IN ('US') AND l47.REQST_TYPE <> 'PO' AND NVL(l54.DELVRY_GI_CMPLT, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(l55.del_flag,'N') <> 'Y' AND NVL(l47.REQST_DEL , 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(l48.REQST_DEL , 'N') = 'N'
AND (l55.DELVRY_NO = #{searchDeliveryOrRequestNo} OR l47.REQST_NO = #{searchDeliveryOrRequestNo})
GROUP BY l55.DELVRY_NO, l47.REQST_NO, l47.REQST_CRT_DT, L47.REQST_TYPE, l47.TRNSC_TYPE, l47.TRNSC_TYPE_DTL, s28q.WH_LOC_DESC, l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC, l47.REQST_CDC_RDC, l54.DELVRY_DT, l55.DELVRY_QTY ) Z GROUP BY Z.DELNO, Z.REQSTNO, Z.REQSTDT, Z.REQSTTYPE, Z.TRNSCTYPE, Z.TRNSCTYPEDTL, Z.TOLOC, Z.FRMLOCID, Z.TOLOCID, Z.DELDATE ORDER BY Z.DELDATE, Z.REQSTDT
